title: Can t lock champion in normal draft!
body: I ve gone into a normal draft game and i could've ban a champ but when is my turn to pick i couldn't lock the champ i selected...wtf? Now really riot should first repair the game instead of launching new champs and skins...

replies.body: It sounds like you lost sync in champion select, which usually indicates a network problem failing to maintain a connection.  When you join matchmaking, the server pulls everyone together, but you can lose sync and ultimately disconnect if your connection isn't strong enough.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up!
